# [[art director]] {{gloss|person who supervises and unifies the vision of an artistic production, including its visual appearance and psychological appeal to a target audience}}
types.html:
directeur artistique m (plural directeurs artistiques)

  1. art director (person who supervises and unifies the vision of an artistic production, including its visual appearance and psychological appeal to a target audience)

title: directeur artistique
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /di.ʁɛk.tœʁ aʁ.tis.tik/
